testcase.brief: After change vlan and ip address of dhcp server, the corresponding config file should change
testcase.description:
Pre-Condition: BR100: Set vlan to interface mgt0.1 Set ip address to interface mgt0.1 Enable DHCP server on interface mgt0.1 Set ip-pool to dhcp-server mgt0.1 Enable DNS server on mgt0.1 interface mgt0.1 vlan 100 interface mgt0.1 ip 100.100.100.1/24 interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server options default-gateway 100.100.100.1 interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server options dns1 100.100.100.1 interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server ip-pool 100.100.100.10 100.100.100.100 interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server enable interface mgt0.1 dns-server enable
Test Procedure: 1. Check DNS config file of mgt0.1 in shell 2. Change vlan of interface mgt0.1, disable dhcp-server of mgt0.1, change ip address of mgt0.1, remove ip-pool of mgt0.1, enable dhcp-server again, set new ip-pool, gateway, dns, check DNS config file in shell AH-671940#show running-config | in mgt0.1 interface mgt0.1 vlan 200 interface mgt0.1 ip 200.200.200.1/24 interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server options default-gateway 200.200.200.1 interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server options dns1 200.200.200.1 interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server ip-pool 200.200.200.100 200.200.200.200 interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server enable interface mgt0.1 dns-server enable

step.desc: config CVG act as l3 VPN server
step.telnet: -v "save vpn ee-cert tftp://${pub.tftp1.tip}:certs/server_cert.pem" -v "save vpn private-key tftp://${pub.tftp1.tip}:certs/server_key.pem" -v "vpn xauth-client-list ${hive.name}_List local" -v "vpn xauth-client-list ${hive.name}_List client-name ${br1.br.name} password aerohive" -v "vpn server-ipsec-tunnel ${hive.name}_Server vpn-mode layer-3" -v "vpn ipsec-tunnel ${hive.name}_Server client-list ${hive.name}_List" -v "vpn tunnel-policy vpn_tunnel_policy server ipsec-tunnel ${hive.name}_Server" -v "routing internal-sub-network ${br1.br.mgt0.ip}/${br.mgt0.supermask}" -v "routing internal-sub-network ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip}/${br.mgt0.supermask}"
-v "routing protocol ospf advertise eth1" -v "routing protocol ospf router-id ${cvg1.cvg.lan.ip}" -v "routing protocol type ospf" -v "routing protocol enable"

step.desc: config BR with WAN interface, nat enable
step.telnet: -v "hive ${hive.name}" -v "interface mgt0 hive ${hive.name}" -v "no interface mgt0 dhcp client" -v "no interface mgt0 dhcp-server enable" -v "interface mgt0 ip ${br1.br.mgt0.ip}/${cvg1.cvg.wan.netmask}"

step.desc: Show interface eth0 dhcp client to check if DNS server be obtained
config mgt0.1 with dhcp service enable,dns service enable
step.telnet: -v "interface mgt0.1 vlan ${br1.vpc1.vlan}" -v "interface mgt0.1 ip ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip}/${br.lan.netmask}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server ip-pool ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip_pool_start} ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip_pool_end}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server options netmask 255.255.255.0" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server options default-gateway ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server options dns1 ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server enable" -v "interface mgt0.1 dns-server enable"

step.desc: Set interface eth0 to wan mode,eth1 to access mode and enable mac-learning
step.telnet: -v "user-profile lan1 qos-policy def-user-qos vlan-id ${br1.vpc1.vlan} attribute 1" -v "interface eth1 mode bridge-access user-profile-attribute 1" -v "interface eth1 mac-learning enable"

step.desc: config BR as l3 VPN client
step.console: -v "save vpn ca-cert tftp://${pub.tftp1.tip}:certs/cacert.pem" -v "vpn client-ipsec-tunnel ${br1.br.name}_client_ipsec_1 vpn-mode layer-3" -v "vpn ipsec-tunnel ${br1.br.name}_client_ipsec_1 gateway ${cvg1.cvg.mip.ip} client-name ${br1.br.name} password aerohive" -v "vpn tunnel-policy vpn_tunnel_policy client ipsec-tunnel ${br1.br.name}_client_ipsec_1 primary" -v "routing route-request enable" -v "routing internal-sub-network ${br1.br.mgt0.ip}/${br.mgt0.supermask}" -v "routing internal-sub-network ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip}/${cvg1.cvg.wan.netmask}"

step.desc: br1.vpc1 get ip addr from dhcp server of mgt0.1
set br1.vpc1.tif.ip var for vpc1 on BR side
check vpn ike sa on BR1 side
check vpn ike sa on CVG side
check gre tunnel on br1 side
check gre tunnel on cvg side
Set filter _ff id 1 dst-port 53 bidirectional Open debug _kdebug fe basic/detail and debug console
step.telnet: -v "_ff id 1 dst-port 53 bidirectional" -v "_kdebug fe basic" -v "_kdebug fe detail" -v "clear log all"

step.desc: Check DNS config file of mgt0.1 in shell
Change vlan of interface mgt0.1, disable dhcp-server of mgt0.1, change ip address of mgt0.1, remove ip-pool of mgt0.1, enable dhcp-server again, set new ip-pool, gateway, dns,
step.telnet: -v "no interface mgt0.1 dns-server enable" -v "no interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server enable" -v "no interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server ip-pool ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip_pool_start} ${br1.br.mgt0.1.ip_pool_end}" -v "interface mgt0.1 vlan ${br1.vpc2.vlan}" -v "interface mgt0.1 ip ${br1.br.mgt0.2.ip}/${br.lan.netmask}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server ip-pool ${br1.br.mgt0.2.ip_pool_start} ${br1.br.mgt0.2.ip_pool_end}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server options netmask 255.255.255.0" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server options default-gateway ${br1.br.mgt0.2.ip}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server options dns1 ${br1.br.mgt0.2.ip}" -v "interface mgt0.1 dhcp-server enable" -v "interface mgt0.1 dns-server enable"

step.desc: Check DNS config file of mgt0.1 in shell
